string.name: key__phone_pause
string.comment: Label for the Pause key in the telephone keyboard layout

string.name: key__phone_wait
string.comment: Label for the Wait key in the telephone keyboard layout

string.name: key_popup__threedots_alt
string.comment: Content description for the three-dots icon in a key popup

resources.string: Îkona sê-dot. Eger xuya be, nîşan dide ku eger zêdetir pêl bê kirin, zêdetir tîp dikarin bên bikaranîn.

string.name: private_mode_dialog__title
string.comment: Title of the private mode dialog

string.name: media__tab__emojis
string.comment: Tab description for emojis in the media UI

string.name: media__tab__emoticons
string.comment: Tab description for emoticons in the media UI

string.name: media__tab__kaomoji
string.comment: Tab description for kaomoji in the media UI

string.name: smartbar__quick_action__open_settings
string.comment: Content-description for the settings quick action in Smartbar

string.name: settings__menu
string.comment: Hint of top-right three-dot icon in Settings

string.name: settings__menu_help
string.comment: Three-dot menu entry for Help and Feedback web link

string.name: settings__help
string.comment: General label for help buttons in Settings

string.name: settings__navigation__home
string.comment: Long-press hint of bottom nav item Home in Settings

string.name: settings__navigation__keyboard
string.comment: Long-press hint of bottom nav item Keyboard in Settings

string.name: settings__navigation__typing
string.comment: Long-press hint of bottom nav item Typing in Settings

string.name: settings__navigation__theme
string.comment: Long-press hint of bottom nav item Theme in Settings

string.name: settings__navigation__gestures
string.comment: Long-press hint of bottom nav item Gestures in Settings

string.name: settings__default
string.comment: General string which is used when a preference has the default value set

string.name: settings__system_default
string.comment: General string which is used when a preference has the system default value set

string.name: settings__home__ime_not_enabled
string.comment: Error message shown in Home fragment when FlorisBoard is not enabled in the system

resources.string: FlorisBoard di pergalê de ne çalak e û ji ber vê yekê dê wekî rêbazek têketê di hilbijarka têketê de tune be. Ji bo çareserkirina vê pirsgirêkê li vir bitikin.

string.name: settings__home__ime_not_selected
string.comment: Warning message shown in Home fragment when FlorisBoard is not selected as the default keyboard

resources.string: FlorisBoard wekî metoda têketê ya pêşdarazî nayê hilbijartin. Ji bo çareserkirina vê pirsgirêkê li vir bitikin.

string.name: settings__home__contribute
string.comment: Contributing message shown in Home fragment

resources.string: Spas ji bo ceribandina FlorisBoard! Ev proje hîn di alfayê de ye û ji ber vê yekê taybetmendiyên winda Heke tu çewtiyekê dibînî an jî dixwazî pêşniyarekê bikî, ji kerema xwe repo ya li GitHub vekolin û pirsgirêkê pel bikin. Ev dibe alîkar ku FlorisBoard baştir bibe. Sax bî!

string.name: settings__localization__title
string.comment: Title of languages and layout box in the Typing fragment

string.name: settings__localization__subtype_no_subtypes_configured_warning
string.comment: Warning message that no subtype has been defined in the Typing fragment

resources.string: Wusa dixuye ku te tu cureyên jêr ava nekirine. Wekî paşvekê wê subtype English/QWERTY were bikaranîn!

string.name: settings__localization__subtype_add_title
string.comment: Title of subtype dialog when adding a new subtype

string.name: settings__localization__subtype_edit_title
string.comment: Title of subtype dialog when editing an existing subtype

string.name: settings__localization__subtype_locale
string.comment: Label for locale dropdown in subtype dialog

string.name: settings__theme__undefined
string.comment: General string for an undefined preference value

string.name: pref__theme__mode__label
string.comment: Label of the theme mode preference

string.name: pref__theme__sunrise_time__label
string.comment: Label of the sunrise time preference

string.name: pref__theme__sunset_time__label
string.comment: Label of the sunset time preference

string.name: pref__theme__day
string.comment: Label of the day group (day means light theme)

string.name: pref__theme__night
string.comment: Label of the night group (night means dark theme)

string.name: pref__theme__any_theme__label
string.comment: Label of the theme selector preference

string.name: pref__theme__any_theme_adapt_to_app__label
string.comment: Label of the theme adapt to app preference

resources.string: Rengan li gorî pêvekan adapte bike

string.name: settings__theme_editor__error_theme_label_empty
string.comment: Error text for an empty theme label

resources.string: Ji kerema xwe re navekî dirbê têkeve.

string.comment: Preference value for swipe velocity threshold

string.name: pref__gestures__swipe_velocity_threshold__normal
string.comment: Preference value for swipe velocity threshold

string.name: pref__gestures__swipe_velocity_threshold__fast
string.comment: Preference value for swipe velocity threshold

string.comment: Preference value for swipe distance threshold

string.comment: Label of View licenses button in About
